law.history: Repealed 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 7, sec. 28. -- Amended 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 49, sec. 1. -- Amended 1944 Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 3. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2241.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Selection of names for jury service; number of names; filling of drum.
